channel.title: WWDC on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in WWDC on Damien Saunders

item.title: Are you thinking what I'm thinking? Two predictions for Steve Jobs?
item.description: Are you thinking what I’m thinking? It’s only a few hours til the start of the Apple WWDC which is ‘the biggest’ event in the year for Apple Fans. Something borrowed or something blue? Apple, Lion & iOS5 Does Apple’s new software tickle your fancy? does the idea of conjoined operating systems for mobile and computers excite you? Yeh I really want a touch-screen on my MacBook Pro - but that will never happen.
